channel.title: dplavsic on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in dplavsic on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dejan Plavsic
item.description: Dejan Plavsic is a co-op student here at IQC. He will be working on the mechanical design of the trapped ion system quantum computer. He is excited to contribute to such cutting-edge research and looks forward to collaborating with others.
